sentences.en: A good anvil does not fear hammer.
A good anvil does not fear the hammer.
sentences.cn: 真金不怕火炼,好汉不怕考验.

sentences.en: A senior civil servant in Morocco laments that his country is “between the hammer and the anvil” of Africa and Europe.
sentences.cn: 一位摩洛哥高级文职官员不无惋惜地表示，自己的国家是身处非洲和欧洲的"锤砧之间"。

sentences.en: Anvil cover size is standard worldwide specification . Easy for change over.
sentences.cn: 钻板轮外装优力胶垫,其格尺寸为世界通用之格.

sentences.en: Die setters select dies for forging according to work order and specifications; position align and bolt dies to ram and anvil of power presses and hammers.
sentences.cn: 模具制定者根据工作秩序和规格选择模具进行锻造；将模具对准并拴紧在动力压力机和锤子的撞锤和铁砧。

sentences.en: Discussion is the anvil upon which the spark of truth is struck.
sentences.cn: 辩论是生出真理火花的铁砧(辩论出真理).

sentences.en: Emergency when anvil and roller levers on the foil.
sentences.cn: 应急时可在砧辊筒的相应位置上贴膜.

sentences.en: His independence had been forged on the anvil of a harsh environment.
sentences.cn: 他的独立性是在艰苦的环境中锤炼出来的。

sentences.en: Nut-cracking, for example, is a complex skill that involves placing a nut between an anvil stone and a hammer stone and coordinating the movements to hit the nut just right.
sentences.cn: 例如，弄碎坚果是一项复杂的技能，需要将坚果放在石砧和石锤之间，然后调整动作以恰当的方式击打坚果。

sentences.en: P. Box Anvil, used to secure parallel specimens.
sentences.cn: 砧板盒, 用来安放双面平行的实验样品.

sentences.en: Scientists recently used a diamond anvil like this one to squeeze tiny samples of metallic glass.
sentences.cn: 最近，科学家用一种像图中所示的菱形铁砧来压制金属玻璃的小样品。

sentences.en: The anvil is not afraid of the hammer.
The anvil onto which the staples are pressed was not assemble correctly.
sentences.cn: 订书机上的铁砧安装错位.

sentences.en: The man put the iron block on the anvil.
sentences.cn: 那人把铁块放在铁砧上.

sentences.en: The young's stock in trade consisted of a forge, anvil, hammers, etc.
sentences.cn: 这位铁匠的全套工具是由锻炉 、 铁砧 、 铁锤等组成的.

sentences.en: They are working two pieces of metal together on the anvil.
sentences.cn: 他们正在铁砧上将两片金属加工在一起.

sentences.en: This is the Anvil of Fury - good work, my friend.
sentences.cn: 这是愤怒的铁砧 -- 太好了, 我的朋友.

sentences.en: This was compared with a block of iron squeezed on an anvil.
sentences.cn: 这可与一块放在铁砧上受挤压的铁相比照.

trans.tran_en: a heavy iron block on which pieces of hot metal are shaped using a hammer
